channel.title: 317 pest control help
channel.description: hey guys for my pest control every game you recive 1.25k i want to increase this how can i make the coins you receive higher? please help thank you

item.title: 317 pest control help
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Do you see this?

[code= c.getItems().addItem(995, c.combatLevel * 10);[/code]

That’s the method that add’s items just increase it.[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: 317 pest control help
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

[quote=“erlasz, post:3, topic:461040”]i found this in pest control.java but it doesnt say 1.250k

c.sendMessage(“You have won the pest control game and have been awarded 1 pest control point.”);
c.pcPoints += 2;
c.dir1 = -1;
c.playerLevel[3] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]);
c.playerLevel[5] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]);
c.specAmount = 10;
c.getItems().addItem(995, c.combatLevel * 10);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(3);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(5);
} else if (won) {[/quote]
is this pi or delta?

Read full topic
